front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Neutral Grounding in Electrical Utility Systems, Part VI - Systems Supplied by Current-Regulated Sources

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Applications to three-phase electrical utility systems are described in this Part VI of the IEEE C62.92(TM) series. Definitions and considerations related to system grounding where the dominant sources of system energization are current-regulated or power-regulated power conversion devices are provided.
